history.proof: intros A a b R EQ. inversion EQ as [REF SYM TRANS]. intros Rab. hauto l: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros A a b R EQ.
apply sum_rect with (P := fun x => (R + R)%rel x (inl b)).

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (R : relation A), Equivalence R -> R a b -> (R + R)%rel (inl a) (inl b)

Premises:
rel = fun A1 A2 : Type => A1 -> A2 -> Prop : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments rel (_ _)%type_scope
Inductive sum (A B : Type) : Type := inl : A -> A + B | inr : B -> A + B Arguments sum (_ _)%type_scope Arguments inl {A B}%type_scope, [A] _ _ Arguments inr {A B}%type_scope, _ [B] _
Record Equivalence (A : Type) (R : relation A) : Prop := Build_Equivalence { Equivalence_Reflexive : Reflexive R; Equivalence_Symmetric : Symmetric R; Equivalence_Transitive : Transitive R } Arguments Equivalence {A}%type_scope _%rel_scope Arguments Build_Equivalence {A}%type_scope _%rel_scope
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA
Fin.R : forall n : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n + ?m) where ?m : [ |- nat]
relation = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments relation _%type_scope
sum_rec : forall (A B : Type) (P : A + B -> Set), (forall a : A, P (inl a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inr b)) -> forall s : A + B, P s
sum_rect : forall (A B : Type) (P : A + B -> Type), (forall a : A, P (inl a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inr b)) -> forall s : A + B, P s
sum_sind : forall (A B : Type) (P : A + B -> SProp), (forall a : A, P (inl a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inr b)) -> forall s : A + B, P s
sum_ind : forall (A B : Type) (P : A + B -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (inl a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inr b)) -> forall s : A + B, P s
set_le = fun (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (sA : A -> Prop) (sB : B -> Prop) => forall a : A, sA a -> exists b : B, (sB b /\ R a b)%type : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel (A -> Prop) (B -> Prop) Arguments set_le {A B}%type_scope _%rel_scope
set_ge = fun (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (sA : A -> Prop) (sB : B -> Prop) => forall b : B, sB b -> exists a : A, (sA a /\ R a b)%type : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel (A -> Prop) (B -> Prop) Arguments set_ge {A B}%type_scope _%rel_scope
Setoid.Build_Setoid_Theory : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), Reflexive R -> Symmetric R -> Transitive R -> Equivalence R
morphisms_proper_related : forall (R : relation ?A) (a : ?A), (normalization_done -> Proper R a) -> Monotonic a R where ?A : [ |- Type]
arrow_pointwise_refl = fun (T A : Type) (R : relation A) (H : Reflexive R) (x : T -> A) (a : T) => (fun H0 : R (x a) (x a) => H0) (H (x a)) : forall (T A : Type) (R : relation A), Reflexive R -> Reflexive (- ==> R) Arguments arrow_pointwise_refl {T A}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope
list_rel_refl = fun (A : Type) (R : relation A) (HR : Reflexive R) (l : list A) => list_ind (fun l0 : list A => list_rel R l0 l0) (nil_rel_def R) (fun (a : A) (l0 : list A) (IHl : list_rel R l0 l0) => cons_rel_def R a a (HR a) l0 l0 IHl) l : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), Reflexive R -> Reflexive (list_rel R) Arguments list_rel_refl {A}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> Prop), (forall y : A, R x y -> P y) -> P x -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl A R x a -> P a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> SProp), (forall y : A, R x y -> P y) -> P x -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl A R x a -> P a
forall_relation_relim : forall (R : forall a : ?A, relation (?B a)) (f g : forall x : ?A, ?B x) (a : ?A) (P Q : Prop), RElim (R a) (f a) (g a) P Q -> RElim (forall_relation R) f g P Q where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- ?A -> Type]
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_n1_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> Prop), P x -> (forall y z : A, R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_n1 A R x y -> P y -> P z) -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_n1 A R x a -> P a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_n1_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> SProp), P x -> (forall y z : A, R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_n1 A R x y -> P y -> P z) -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_n1 A R x a -> P a
transitive_rcompose = fun (A : Type) (R : relation A) (H : Transitive R) => H : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), Transitive R -> RCompose R R R Arguments transitive_rcompose {A}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_n1_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> SProp), P x -> (forall y z : A, R y z \/ R z y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_n1 A R x y -> P y -> P z) -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_n1 A R x a -> P a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_n1_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> Prop), P x -> (forall y z : A, R y z \/ R z y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_n1 A R x y -> P y -> P z) -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_n1 A R x a -> P a
Build_preorder : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), reflexive A R -> transitive A R -> preorder A R
Relation_Definitions.Build_PER : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), symmetric A R -> transitive A R -> Relation_Definitions.PER A R
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> Prop), (forall y : A, R x y -> P y) -> (forall y z : A, R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x y -> P y -> P z) -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x a -> P a
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (x : A) (P : A -> SProp), (forall y : A, R x y -> P y) -> (forall y z : A, R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x y -> P y -> P z) -> forall a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x a -> P a
Build_order : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), reflexive A R -> transitive A R -> antisymmetric A R -> order A R
Build_equivalence : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), reflexive A R -> transitive A R -> symmetric A R -> equivalence A R
Relation_Operators.le_AsB_sind : forall (A B : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (leB : B -> B -> Prop) (P : A + B -> A + B -> SProp), (forall x y : A, leA x y -> P (inl x) (inl y)) -> (forall (x : A) (y : B), P (inl x) (inr y)) -> (forall x y : B, leB x y -> P (inr x) (inr y)) -> forall s s0 : A + B, Relation_Operators.le_AsB A B leA leB s s0 -> P s s0

```coq
intros A a b R EQ.
inversion EQ as [REF SYM TRANS].
intros Rab.
apply sum_rect with (P := fun x => (R + R)%rel x (inl b)).
- intros a'. rewrite <- Rab. apply REF.
- intros b'. apply SYM. apply Rab.
Qed.```

original: intros A a b R EQ. inversion EQ as [REF SYM TRANS]. intros Rab. apply sum_rect with (P := fun x => (R + R)%rel x (inl b)). - intros a'. rewrite <- Rab. apply REF. - intros b'. apply SYM. apply Rab.
